original_text: You yourselves know that these hands ministered to my necessities and to those who were with me.
korean_text: 여러분이 아는 바와 같이 이 손으로 나와 내 동행들이 쓰는 것을 충당하여

sentences.original_text: that these hands ministered to my necessities
and to those who were with me
sentences.korean_translation: 나와 함께 있던 사람들에게도 그렇게 했습니다
